pages.text:
ABOUT BRIO ITALIAN GRILLE
Brio Italian Grille
brings the pleasures of a Tuscan country villa with signature cocktails, premium wines and food that celebrates the freshest and finest ingredients. In Italian, brio means “
lively or joyful
.” And from the robust flavors to the welcoming setting, Brio Italian Grille is just that. BRIO’s villa-like interior will transport you to Tuscany with its hand-crafted Italian mosaics, Venetian plaster walls and arches, soaring ceilings and fine marble countertops. The menu features premium steaks, homemade pastas, fresh seafood and crispy flatbreads prepared in an authentic Italian wood-burning oven.
Brio is Your Favorite Destination for Italian Food
Brio Italian Kitchen is upscale affordable dining at its best with great tasting Italian food and an inviting atmosphere under a fun, family-friendly Roman ruin decor. Join us after work for
weekday Happy Hours
, Martini Wednesday with the girls, Wine Thursday for a perfect date night, or our can’t miss
Sunday Brunch.
From our Grilled Chicken Marsala to our Pasta Brio, our Tuscan inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to satisfy. Gather with friends, family and co-workers to experience the
flavors of Italy
without leaving the country. Find your Local Brio Italian Restaurant and join us for a great Italian meal, we believe that to eat well is to live well. Buon Appetito!
We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner, corporate and event catering, and private group dining. If you prefer to enjoy Brio at home or office, easily order online for take out, curbside pick up and delivery.
Reserve your table and
DINE IN
or
ORDER TO GO
. Hosting a large group event? Select
GROUP DINING
or
ORDER CATERING
online. For more information and for complimentary event planning services, call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
.
Reservations
Order Now
group dining
catering

CONTACT US
At Brio Italian Restaurant,
our greatest pleasure is pleasing our guests
at each meal every day. Your experience greatly matters to us, so we put together answers for our most Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs). Use the links below to find the answer to your question!

BRIO ITALIAN GRILLE FAQS
Everything you wanted to know about Brio Italian Grille. Curious as to “what the word Brio means?” or what our most popular dishes are? We have the answers to your FAQs (Frequently Asked Questions) about Brio Italian restaurant and your favorite Italian food! If we did not answer your question, please visit the Contact Us FAQs.
Contact Us FAQs
How May I Provide Feedback?
We’d love to hear from you. Please send us your feedback with the
Contact Us Form
.
How Do I Contact Brio Italian Media Department?
Thank you for your interest in Brio Italian Grille and our contemporary Italian food. Please email our media department at
[email protected]
.
FAQs About Brio
What Does Brio Mean?
In Italian, the word brio means “lively or joyful.” And from the robust flavors to the welcoming setting, Brio Italian Grille is just that! Brio’s villa-like interior will transport you to Tuscany with its hand-crafted Italian mosaics, Venetian plaster walls and arches, soaring ceilings, and fine marble countertops. The Brio menu features premium steaks, homemade pasta, fresh seafood, and crispy flatbreads prepared in an authentic Italian wood-burning oven.
Tell Me About Brio Italian Restaurant
Brio Italian Grille is upscale affordable dining at its best, with chef-driven Italian food and an inviting atmosphere under a fun, family-friendly Roman ruin decor. We believe “To eat well is to live well”. Join us after work for weekday Happy Hours, Martini Wednesday with the girls, Wine Thursday for a perfect date night, or our can’t miss Sunday Brunch.
From our Grilled Chicken Marsala to our Pasta Brio, and steaks cooked in our wood-burning oven, our Tuscan-inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to satisfy. Gather with friends, family, and co-workers to experience the flavors of Italy without leaving the country. Use our
Locations
page to find your local Brio Italian Restaurant and join us for a great Italian meal. We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner, corporate and event catering, and private group dining. If you prefer to enjoy Brio at home or office, easily order online for take out, curbside pick up and delivery. Learn more
About Brio
Italian Grille here.  Buon Appetito!
Who Owns Brio Italian Restaurant?
Brio Italian Grille is owned and operated by
Earl Enterprises
, a recognized leader in the hospitality industry for over 30 years, building innovative, sustainable brands that guests can enjoy today and in the future.
FaqS ABOUT BRIO ITALIAN EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES
I Am Interested In Working For Brio Italian Grille, How Can I Apply?
Thank you for your interest in joining the Brio Italian Grille team. Please review available Brio employment opportunities for Restaurant Management and Hourly Team Member positions and APPLY FOR
CAREERS
ONLINE  by clicking here.
If you want to apply in person for a part-time or hourly position visit our
locations
page to find your nearest Brio Italian restaurant.
Gift Card FAQs
How Can I Purchase A Gift Card?
Everyone loves the gift of scratch-made Italian food from Brio Italian Grille. Our gift cards may be purchased at your local restaurant or on the Brio website. Check out our new eGift cards on our website. Now you can email friends and family Brio gift cards. You can also find Brio gift cards at many fine retailers, like CVS, Walmart, Cumberland Farms, and BJ’s Wholesale.
How Can I Check The Balance Of My Gift Card?
Visit our Brio
Gift Cards
page to check your gift card balance online.
BRIO ITALIAN ECLUB fAQs
Do You Provide Discount Programs Or Brio Coupons?
Yes! Throughout the year we offer limited-time promotions that add even more value to a dining experience at a Brio Italian Restaurant location near you. Sign up for our
eClub
to receive special news, promotions, and discounts. While sharing is an important part of any Italian meal, we won’t share your information with anyone.
BRIO ITALIAN Specials FAQs
Does Brio Italian Have Specials?
There is always something special happening at your local Brio Italian Grille location. Current Italian food dine in and to go Brio
specials
can be found online and on our
menu
page here. Keep up to date on special offers and seasonal menu items by joining the Brio
eClub
here.
BRIO ITALIAN Holidays FAQs
Is Brio Italian Open On Christmas?
Yes! Most Brio locations are open Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, New Year’s Eve, and New Year’s Day for dine-in service, to go orders, as well as catering pickups and deliveries. Visit our
Locations
page to find the Brio Italian Restaurant location near you and to view special holiday hours.
Make
RESERVATIONS
to dine in. Groups of 20 or more please contact an event planner at your local Brio
LOCATIONS
for more information.
Pre order your Christmas dinner to go or large group Christmas catering order for pick up or delivery by visiting our
Holiday page
.
Can I Have A Holiday Party At Brio?
Our group dining and holiday catering options are perfect for office parties and large groups, and everyone loves our chic atmosphere and Tuscan inspired Italian food for Christmas and New Years. Easily book your group event in advance by clicking
BOOK NOW
and choose from a variety of specially designed group menus, order
Catering
or call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
and speak with one of our expert holiday event planners to customize your event. For more information about
HOLIDAYS AT BRIO click here.
Is Brio Italian Open On Valentine’s Day?
Yes! Brio locations are open Valentine’s Day for dine-in service, to go orders, as well as catering pickups and deliveries. Visit our
Locations
directory to find a Brio Italian Restaurant near you and to view special holiday hours.
Make
Reservations
to dine in. Groups of 20 or more please contact an event planner at your local Brio
LOCATIONS
for more information.
Pre order your Valentine’s dinner to go or large group Valentine’s catering order for pick up or delivery.
Is Brio Italian Open On Easter Sunday?
Yes! Most Brio locations are open Easter Sunday for dine-in service, to go orders, as well as catering pickups and deliveries. Use our
Locations
page to find a Brio near you and to view special holiday hours.
Make
Reservations
to dine in. Groups of 20 or more please contact an event planner at your local Brio
LOCATIONS
for more information.
Pre order your Easter dinner to go or large group Easter catering order for pick up or delivery.
Is Brio Italian Open On Mother’s Day?
Yes! Most Brio locations are open Mother’s Day for dine-in service, to go orders, as well as catering pickups and deliveries. Use our
Locations
page to find a Brio near you and to view special holiday hours.
Make
Reservations
to dine in. Groups of 20 or more please contact an event planner at your local Brio
LOCATIONS
for more information.
Pre order your Mother’s Day dinner to go or large group Mother’s Day catering order or pick up or delivery.
Is Brio Italian Open On Thanksgiving?
Most Brio Italian Grille locations are open on Thansgiving Day. Brio offers a special Thanksgiving Feast menu available for dine in, to go and large group catering for Thanksgiving Dinner. View our
Thanksgiving Dinner options here
. Place your Thanksgiving dinner catering order for pickup or delivery.
Visit our
Locations
page to find the Brio Italian restaurant location near you and to view special holiday hours.
BRIO GROUP DINING & CATERING FAQS
Does Brio Accommodate Large Groups?
Yes! Everyone loves Brio’s Italian food! Brio Italian Grille is the perfect event venue and gathering place for colleagues, friends and families, offering the option of family style dining and individual plated meals for Sunday brunch, lunch and dinner. We believe in celebrating life together one delicious meal at a time! We accommodate groups of 10 or more with special catering menus served by half pan and full pan, and provide group dining and Banquet menu packages and complimentary event planning services for groups of 20 or more dining in the restaurant. Easily book your group event in advance online by clicking
BOOK NOW
and choose from a variety of specially designed group menus, order
Catering
or call your local Brio your local Brio
LOCATIONS
and speak with one of our expert event planners to customize your event.
Does Brio Have Special Group Menus?
Yes! Brio has created special group menus for large groups of 20 or more to easily enjoy our contemporary Italian food, antipasti, salads, pasta dishes, Italian signature entrees, chophouse favorites, and tempting desserts for any special occasion. Raise a glass of wine, or two, as your group celebrates birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, baby showers, wedding events, office luncheons, or any special occasion. Brio offers bar packages to work within every budget, whether you are lifting a mimosa at brunch, enjoying a martini during a fabulous cocktail reception, or pairing wine with dinner. View our
EVENT MENUS
or call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
and speak with one of our expert event planners to customize a menu for your event.
Do You Have A Brio Catering Menu? Do You Offer Catering Menu? Do You Offer Catering For Office Lunches Or Home Parties?
Yes! Brio Italian Catering menus are perfect whether you are looking to plan an office lunch to feed the team or host a large family event. Choose from our Traditional Italian Catering Packages to feed 10 people or more, customize your event menu from our a la carte catering options, and order individual meals for guests eating at staggered times. Our group catering menus feature a wide variety of contemporary Italian food, signature entrees, chophouse favorites, seafood, oven baked pasta, including vegetarian & gluten-sensitive options sure to please. Let us help plan your event with tempting party platters and catering packages priced to fit your budget and warm hospitality to manage every detail. Contact our expert event planners at your local Brio for more information.
Ordering
Catering
is quick and easy. Place your order in advance and we’ll deliver right to your door or have your order ready at a convenient time for curbside pickup.
View our
Catering
menu here.
How Do I Order Brio Italian Catering?
Feeding a crowd? Contemporary Italian food from Brio is everyone’s favorite! Perfect for office luncheons, family gatherings and parties at home. Easily order
Catering
to place your Catering order for groups of 10 or more from a Brio Italian Grille near you. For any questions and to book your event you may also call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to speak with our catering event planners.
What Is Included With A Brio Italian Catering Order?
Every catering order of Brio’s contemporary Italian food includes our fresh-baked sourdough bread. Butter chips, disposable silverware packets, plates, napkins, and serving utensils are also available upon request.
How Far In Advance Do I Need To Place My Catering Order?
Brio can accommodate most orders on the same day as your event, with 3 hours notice preferred. Some occasions and menu items may require pre-order 24-hours or more in advance. These may include holidays, larger catering orders and early deliveries/pickups. For any questions,call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to speak with our catering event planners.
How Does Catering Delivery Work?
Brio Italian Catering delivery is available within a 10-mile radius from your selected Brio Italian restaurant location. A delivery fee (plus applicable taxes) will be applied. Curbside pickup is also available at no additional charge. Place your
Catering
order in advance and select delivery or pickup options. For any questions, call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to speak with our catering event planners.
How Much Italian Food Should I Order For My Event?
When catering an event, deciding how much food to order can be challenging. Brio Italian Catering menu offers
Full Pans
that feed up to 20 people and
Half Pans
to feed up to 10 people. Brio Italian Catering makes it easy to cater your next gathering, office lunch or group event. Our
Traditional Italian Catering Packages
include starters, salads, sides, pasta, entrees, and desserts. Please view our
Catering
menu here.
Is Brio Italian Grille An Event Venue? Can I Book A Party Or Other Special Event At Brio?
Yes, Brio is the perfect event venue to celebrate life’s special moments! From upscale celebrations to casual gatherings, we offer expert event planning services, menus tailored for small and large groups featuring all your favorite Italian restaurant dishes, and a polished casual setting with semi-private and private event spaces. Easily
BOOK NOW
or contact an event planner at your local Brio for more information.
BRIO ITALIAN TO GO & DELIVERY FAQs
Does Brio Italian Deliver?
Yes, most of our locations deliver our contemporary Italian food to their surrounding areas. Check our
Locations
page to find a Brio Italian Restaurant near you. Enter your address in our
Order Now
page to see if we deliver our fresh salads, Italian flatbreads, and upscale pastas to your neighborhood.
Curbside pickup
is also available.
Does Brio Italian Offer Takeout?
Yes, if you’re craving great pastas, flatbreads, salads, and contemporary Italian food to go, all Brio locations offer takeout.
Order Now
and select curbside pickup.
BRIO ITALIAN GRILLE RESERVATIONS FAQs
Does Brio Take Reservations?
Yes, Brio accepts reservations! Easily reserve your table online by visiting our
RESERVATIONS
page. For parties of 20 or more, book your
GROUP DINING
event online or call our Event Planners at your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to make your large group reservation.
BRIO ITALIAN GRILLE LOCATIONS FAQs
Where Is Brio Italian Grille Located?
Brio headquarters is located in Orlando, Florida and operates many locations across the United States. Visit our
Locations
directory to find a Brio Italian Restaurant near you.
When Are You Opening A Brio In My Hometown?
Brio plans to continue to grow our concept. We are always looking for great new locations to share our contemporary Italian food.
Contact us
and let us know where we should open next!
When Is Brio Italian Grille Open?
Brio is open 7 days a week, including most major holidays. Check our
Locations
directory to find a Brio Italian Restaurant near you and view operating and special holiday hours.
Nutritional Information FAQs
What Is The Nutritional Information For The Brio Menu?
Find Brio Italian
MENU NUTRITIONALS
for our contemporary Italian food on our regular and catering menu.
Where Can I Find The Allergen Information For Brio’s Menu?
Find Brio
MENU ALLERGEN INFORMATION
here
. If you’re looking for Brio’s Italian food nutritional information, you can view our nutritional information as well. Do you have a food allergy question?
CONTACT US
HERE
Does Brio Have A Gluten Free Menu?
At Brio Italian Grille, we strive to be mindful of a variety of dietary restrictions, including gluten sensitivities. Please click here to find our
BRIO GLUTEN SENSITIVE
Italian food menu.
Menu FAQS
What Is On The Brio Italian Menu?
Brio Italian Grille is upscale affordable dining at its best with great tasting contemporary Italian food served in an inviting chic atmosphere. Our chef-driven menu showcases a tour of Italian flavors from appetizers through desserts. Start your meal with one of our fresh salads, flatbreads, or tantalizing Antipasti like the Truffle Toast with Ricotta, our tender Gorgonzola Lamb Chops grilled with gorgonzola crust, sautéed spinach and Marsala sauce, or Bruschetta Sampler.
From our Grilled Chicken Marsala to Filet Mignon, and beloved Italian pasta dishes, including Gnocchi Cacio e Pepe, our Tuscan inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to impress. Gather with friends, family, and co-workers to experience the flavors of Italy without leaving the country.
Join us after work for weekday Happy Hours, Martini Wednesday with the girls, Wine Thursday for a perfect date night, or our can’t miss Sunday Brunch. We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner, corporate and event catering, and private group dining. If you prefer to enjoy Brio at home or office, easily order our contemporary Italian food online for take out, curbside pick up, and delivery. Find your Local Brio Italian Restaurant and join us for a great Italian meal, we believe that to eat well is to live well. Buon Appetito!
VIEW MENU HERE.
Is Brio Italian Grille Open For Lunch?
Yes, Brio is open for lunch and brunch! Visit our
Location
s
page to find a Brio Italian restaurant near you and view lunch operating hours. To view the
Brio Italian Grille lunch menu online
.
Does Brio Italian Grille Have A Happy Hour Menu?
Yes! Participating Brio Italian Grille locations offer a great Happy Hour, weekdays from 3PM – 7PM. The Brio Happy Hour menu features drink specials and menu items for $7 at the bar and outdoor terraces. Enjoy House Wines, Sangria, Craft Beers and
Classic Cocktails
including Martinis, Manhattans and Cosmos paired with
Margherita Flatbread
, Crispy Calamari, and Tomato Caprese. Go for our popular
Brio Burger
with White American Cheese or
Carpaccio
of shaved tender beef.
Explore Happy Hour
.
Does Brio Italian Grille Have A Brunch Menu?
Yes! If you’re looking for a great brunch spot, Brio Italian Grille offers Sunday Brunch menu of favorites such as Avocado Toast topped with heirloom tomatoes and crispy pancetta, Tuscan Sausage Scrambler with Toasted Ciabatta, Berries & Cream French Toast, Bistecca Alla Romano and more. Of course, it wouldn’t be brunch without brunch cocktails! Sangria Rosa, Peach Bellini, White Peach Sangria, Bloody Mary, Mimosa, pick your favorite!
View Brunch Menu
For the best Sunday Brunch in town, make
Reservations
. Visit our
Locations
page to view hours of operation for the Brio near you.
Does Brio Italian Grille Serve Pizza?
Yes! We can ALL agree the most popular Italian food in America is pizza! Brio offers several thin-crust flatbread pizzas perfect for sharing as an appetizer or order as an entree. Try the
Margherita
, the traditional Italian version of a cheese pizza. The
Pollo Al Forno
Flatbread
topped with grilled chicken, house-made tomato sauce, bacon, scallions, feta, and creamy parmesan dressing is our twist on white pizza. Meat lovers should try the
Sausage, Pepperoni & Ricotta Flatbread
pizza with Sausage, pepperoni, house-made whipped ricotta, mozzarella, fresh oregano, and house-made tomato sauce is the flatbread for you!.
Hungry for Brio’s Flatbread pizza?
Make
Reservations
to dine in or place an online for take out, curbside pick up or pizza delivery
What Is Brio’s Signature Pasta?
Our Italian restaurants feature an array of
handcrafted pasta
dishes and seasonal specials on our chef-driven menu. Traditional
Spaghetti Bolognese
with ground beef & pork simmered to perfection in our red wine marinara is always satisfying for classic pasta lovers. Guest favorite
Pasta Brio
offers a hearty portion of rigatoni with grilled chicken, mushrooms, spinach, and red peppers in our robust roasted red pepper cream sauce that will tempt you into clearing your entire bowl!
Craving a baked ziti dish? Brio uses Italian Rigatoni pasta with grooves and ridges to hold our scratch made sauces. Try our popular
Sausage Rigatoni Arrabbiata
with mild Italian sausage, charred tomato sauce, and fresh mozzarella in a creamy garlic sauce. The flavors of coastal Italy shine in our
Sicilian Spaghetti with Shrimp
with sun-dried tomatoes, olives, artichokes & yellow onions topped with briny feta and seared shrimp. The luxurious
Lobster & Shrimp Fettuccine
tossed in a light cream sauce is an unmatched option for seafood lovers. Enjoy a variety of contemporary Italian food specialties at Brio! Make
Reservations
to dine in, or place an online order for take out, curbside pick up, or delivery.
Does Brio Italian Grille Serve Vegetarian Dishes?
Brio Italian Grille offers a variety of vegetarian menu items. Consult with a Brio restaurant manager for guidance on any dietary restrictions and allergies.
Spinach & Artichoke Dip
Creamy spinach, roasted garlic, artichoke, crispy parmesan flatbread
Truffle Garlic Toast with Ricotta
Parmesan-crusted, vine-ripened tomatoes, house marinara, fresh mozzarella, basil
Chopped Salad
Chopped greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, onions, feta, red wine vinaigrette
Tomato Caprese
Vine-ripened tomatoes, arugula, fresh mozzarella, basil, balsamic drizzle
Margherita Flatbread
Vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, extra-virgin olive oil
Spaghetti Pomodoro
House-made tomato compote, basil, Parmesan
Ravioli Di Bello
Portobello ravioli, crimini mushrooms, roasted grape tomatoes, Grana Padano Zanetti, fresh thyme, brown butter sauce
Gnocchi Cacio e Pepe
House-made ricotta gnocchi in a Cacio e Pepe sauce, garnished with freshly grated Reggiano & cracked black pepper
Vegan
: Spaghetti Pomodoro (no Parmesan) Chopped Salad (no feta)
Sides
: Broccolini, Asparagus, Fingerling Potatoes (no dairy listed on allergen chart)

BRIO GROUP DINING & CATERING FAQS
Does Brio Accommodate Large Groups?
Yes! Everyone loves Brio’s Italian food! Brio Italian Grille is the perfect event venue and gathering place for colleagues, friends and families, offering the option of family style dining and individual plated meals for Sunday brunch, lunch and dinner. We believe in celebrating life together one delicious meal at a time! We accommodate groups of 10 or more with special catering menus served by half pan and full pan, and provide group dining and Banquet menu packages and complimentary event planning services for groups of 20 or more dining in the restaurant. Easily book your group event in advance online by clicking
BOOK NOW
and choose from a variety of specially designed group menus, order
Catering

Does Brio Have Special Group Menus?
Yes! Brio has created special group menus for large groups of 20 or more to easily enjoy our contemporary Italian food, antipasti, salads, pasta dishes, Italian signature entrees, chophouse favorites, and tempting desserts for any special occasion. Raise a glass of wine, or two, as your group celebrates birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, baby showers, wedding events, office luncheons, or any special occasion. Brio offers bar packages to work within every budget, whether you are lifting a mimosa at brunch, enjoying a martini during a fabulous cocktail reception, or pairing wine with dinner. View our
EVENT MENUS
or call your local Brio

and speak with one of our expert event planners to customize a menu for your event.
Do You Have A Brio Catering Menu? Do You Offer Catering Menu? Do You Offer Catering For Office Lunches Or Home Parties?
Yes! Brio Italian Catering menus are perfect whether you are looking to plan an office lunch to feed the team or host a large family event. Choose from our Traditional Italian Catering Packages to feed 10 people or more, customize your event menu from our a la carte catering options, and order individual meals for guests eating at staggered times. Our group catering menus feature a wide variety of contemporary Italian food, signature entrees, chophouse favorites, seafood, oven baked pasta, including vegetarian & gluten-sensitive options sure to please. Let us help plan your event with tempting party platters and catering packages priced to fit your budget and warm hospitality to manage every detail. Contact our expert event planners at your local Brio for more information.

How Do I Order Brio Italian Catering?
Feeding a crowd? Contemporary Italian food from Brio is everyone’s favorite! Perfect for office luncheons, family gatherings and parties at home. Easily order
Catering
to place your Catering order for groups of 10 or more from a Brio Italian Grille near you. For any questions and to book your event you may also call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to speak with our catering event planners.
What Is Included With A Brio Italian Catering Order?
Every catering order of Brio’s contemporary Italian food includes our fresh-baked sourdough bread. Butter chips, disposable silverware packets, plates, napkins, and serving utensils are also available upon request.
How Far In Advance Do I Need To Place My Catering Order?
Brio can accommodate most orders on the same day as your event, with 3 hours notice preferred. Some occasions and menu items may require pre-order 24-hours or more in advance. These may include holidays, larger catering orders and early deliveries/pickups. For any questions,call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to speak with our catering event planners.
How Does Catering Delivery Work?
Brio Italian Catering delivery is available within a 10-mile radius from your selected Brio Italian restaurant location. A delivery fee (plus applicable taxes) will be applied. Curbside pickup is also available at no additional charge. Place your
Catering
order in advance and select delivery or pickup options. For any questions, call your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to speak with our catering event planners.
How Much Italian Food Should I Order For My Event?
When catering an event, deciding how much food to order can be challenging. Brio Italian Catering menu offers
Full Pans
that feed up to 20 people and
Half Pans
to feed up to 10 people. Brio Italian Catering makes it easy to cater your next gathering, office lunch or group event. Our
Traditional Italian Catering Packages
include starters, salads, sides, pasta, entrees, and desserts. Please view our
Catering
menu here.
Is Brio Italian Grille An Event Venue? Can I Book A Party Or Other Special Event At Brio?
Yes, Brio is the perfect event venue to celebrate life’s special moments! From upscale celebrations to casual gatherings, we offer expert event planning services, menus tailored for small and large groups featuring all your favorite Italian restaurant dishes, and a polished casual setting with semi-private and private event spaces. Menu FAQS
What Is On The Brio Italian Menu?
Brio Italian Grille is upscale affordable dining at its best with great tasting contemporary Italian food served in an inviting chic atmosphere. Our chef-driven menu showcases a tour of Italian flavors from appetizers through desserts. Start your meal with one of our fresh salads, flatbreads, or tantalizing Antipasti like the Truffle Toast with Ricotta, our tender Gorgonzola Lamb Chops grilled with gorgonzola crust, sautéed spinach and Marsala sauce, or Bruschetta Sampler.
From our Grilled Chicken Marsala to Filet Mignon, and beloved Italian pasta dishes, including Gnocchi Cacio e Pepe, our Tuscan inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to impress. Gather with friends, family, and co-workers to experience the flavors of Italy without leaving the country.
Join us after work for weekday Happy Hours, Martini Wednesday with the girls, Wine Thursday for a perfect date night, or our can’t miss Sunday Brunch. We’re open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner, corporate and event catering, and private group dining. If you prefer to enjoy Brio at home or office, easily order our contemporary Italian food online for take out, curbside pick up, and delivery. Find your Local Brio Italian Restaurant and join us for a great Italian meal, we believe that to eat well is to live well. Buon Appetito!
VIEW MENU HERE.

Does Brio Italian Grille Have A Happy Hour Menu?
Yes! Participating Brio Italian Grille locations offer a great Happy Hour, weekdays from 3PM – 7PM. The Brio Happy Hour menu features drink specials and menu items for $7 at the bar and outdoor terraces. Enjoy House Wines, Sangria, Craft Beers and
Classic Cocktails
including Martinis, Manhattans and Cosmos paired with
Margherita Flatbread
, Crispy Calamari, and Tomato Caprese. Go for our popular
Brio Burger
with White American Cheese or
Carpaccio
of shaved tender beef.
Explore Happy Hour
.
Does Brio Italian Grille Have A Brunch Menu?
Yes! If you’re looking for a great brunch spot, Brio Italian Grille offers Sunday Brunch menu of favorites such as Avocado Toast topped with heirloom tomatoes and crispy pancetta, Tuscan Sausage Scrambler with Toasted Ciabatta, Berries & Cream French Toast, Bistecca Alla Romano and more. Of course, it wouldn’t be brunch without brunch cocktails! Sangria Rosa, Peach Bellini, White Peach Sangria, Bloody Mary, Mimosa, pick your favorite!
View Brunch Menu
For the best Sunday Brunch in town, make

Does Brio Italian Grille Serve Pizza?
Yes! We can ALL agree the most popular Italian food in America is pizza! Brio offers several thin-crust flatbread pizzas perfect for sharing as an appetizer or order as an entree. Try the
Margherita
, the traditional Italian version of a cheese pizza. The
Pollo Al Forno
Flatbread
topped with grilled chicken, house-made tomato sauce, bacon, scallions, feta, and creamy parmesan dressing is our twist on white pizza. Meat lovers should try the
Sausage, Pepperoni & Ricotta Flatbread
pizza with Sausage, pepperoni, house-made whipped ricotta, mozzarella, fresh oregano, and house-made tomato sauce is the flatbread for you!.
Hungry for Brio’s Flatbread pizza?
Make
Reservations
to dine in or place an online for take out, curbside pick up or pizza delivery
What Is Brio’s Signature Pasta?
Our Italian restaurants feature an array of
handcrafted pasta
dishes and seasonal specials on our chef-driven menu. Traditional
Spaghetti Bolognese
with ground beef & pork simmered to perfection in our red wine marinara is always satisfying for classic pasta lovers. Guest favorite
Pasta Brio
offers a hearty portion of rigatoni with grilled chicken, mushrooms, spinach, and red peppers in our robust roasted red pepper cream sauce that will tempt you into clearing your entire bowl!
Craving a baked ziti dish? Brio uses Italian Rigatoni pasta with grooves and ridges to hold our scratch made sauces. Try our popular
Sausage Rigatoni Arrabbiata
with mild Italian sausage, charred tomato sauce, and fresh mozzarella in a creamy garlic sauce. The flavors of coastal Italy shine in our
Sicilian Spaghetti with Shrimp
with sun-dried tomatoes, olives, artichokes & yellow onions topped with briny feta and seared shrimp. The luxurious
Lobster & Shrimp Fettuccine
tossed in a light cream sauce is an unmatched option for seafood lovers. Enjoy a variety of contemporary Italian food specialties at Brio! Make
Reservations
to dine in, or place an online order for take out, curbside pick up, or delivery.
Does Brio Italian Grille Serve Vegetarian Dishes?
Brio Italian Grille offers a variety of vegetarian menu items. Consult with a Brio restaurant manager for guidance on any dietary restrictions and allergies.
Spinach & Artichoke Dip
Creamy spinach, roasted garlic, artichoke, crispy parmesan flatbread
Truffle Garlic Toast with Ricotta
Parmesan-crusted, vine-ripened tomatoes, house marinara, fresh mozzarella, basil
Chopped Salad
Chopped greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, onions, feta, red wine vinaigrette
Tomato Caprese
Vine-ripened tomatoes, arugula, fresh mozzarella, basil, balsamic drizzle
Margherita Flatbread
Vine-ripened tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, basil, extra-virgin olive oil
Spaghetti Pomodoro
House-made tomato compote, basil, Parmesan
Ravioli Di Bello
Portobello ravioli, crimini mushrooms, roasted grape tomatoes, Grana Padano Zanetti, fresh thyme, brown butter sauce
Gnocchi Cacio e Pepe
House-made ricotta gnocchi in a Cacio e Pepe sauce, garnished with freshly grated Reggiano & cracked black pepper
Vegan
: Spaghetti Pomodoro (no Parmesan) Chopped Salad (no feta)
Sides
: Broccolini, Asparagus, Fingerling Potatoes (no dairy listed on allergen chart)

UNIQUE GROUP DINING MENUS
When it comes to great food, Italians know best! Our chef-driven group dining menus showcase our Northern Italian cuisine using the freshest and highest quality ingredients. Keep it casual with
made to order pastas and crisp salads
, or get dressed up with
filet, lamb chops and chicken marsala
for an elegant Tuscan feast to celebrate your next special occasion. Brio offers a wide variety of
family-style and plated menu options
for lunch, brunch, dinner and cocktail parties for a truly memorable group dining experience.
Italian food is everyone’s favorite and at Brio our unique group menus are designed to not only impress everyone but they are
customizable to accommodate dietary preferences
including gluten-free and vegetarian. Your event guests will delight in our most popular dishes including Chicken Milanese, Gorgonzola Crusted Beef Medallions, Mezza Lasagna, and Pesto Primavera served with your choice of Lobster Bisque or Brio Italian Restaurant famous Chopped Salad.
Of course, no Italian feast would be complete without a glass of wine or a cocktail! Our group friendly
beverage packages
(where legally allowed), offer something for everyone. Your guests can toast to their heart’s content. We’ll make sure you have an incredible experience to remember. Come discover the Brio way to celebrate your next special event.
STRESS FREE EVENT PLANNING
We make event planning easy and stress-free at Brio. A
dedicated event planner
will guide you every step of the way, from menu selection to ensuring the room is set up exactly as you wish the day of your event. Have questions or wish to customize your group dining experience? Call us at your local Brio
LOCATIONS
to discuss your group event and learn more about our event planning services for groups of 20 or more guests, as well as the variety of menu options available to accommodate your budget.
